price: Wọ́n ń fi Allāhu búra pé dájúdájú àwọn kúkú wà lára yín. Wọn kò sì sí lára yín, ṣùgbọ́n dájúdájú wọ́n jẹ́ ìjọ kan tó ń bẹ̀rù.¹
arabic: وَيَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ إِنَّهُمۡ لَمِنكُمۡ وَمَا هُم مِّنكُمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ يَفۡرَقُونَ
footnotes: 1. Wọ́n bẹ̀rù láti fi àìgbàgbọ́ wọn hàn síta, wọ́n yáa ń fi ’Islām wọn ṣe bojúbojú.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaḥlifūna bil-lahi innahum laminkum wamā hum minkum walākinnahum qawmun yafraqūna
